venice.hub

Class RPCControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • venice.hub.VeniceControl
      • venice.hub.RPCControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RPCControl
extends VeniceControl
    Sets up a RPC server for controlling VeniceHub via RPC.

    A RPC client can call:

    • play()
    • pause()
    • play_pause()
    • seek(long timestamp)
    • quit()

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class venice.hub.VeniceControl

        active, finished
